The History of Galadriel and Celeborn

wikitext.*:
'''Prince of [[Dol Amroth]]''' was a title used by a noble house of [[Gondor]]. ==History== The Princes are the male heirs of the [[House of Dol Amroth]]. That House was of noble [[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] origin from the [[Second Age]]; they were [[Faithful]] akin to the [[Lords of Andúnië]] in [[Númenor]], and later [[Elendil]] gave to their ruler the title of [[Prince]].{{UT|Cirion}}, Note 39 The first Prince of Dol Amroth was [[Galador]], who, according to legend, was the son of [[Mithrellas]], an Elf maid.{{UT|Galadriel}} This supposed elven strain was noticed in [[Imrahil]] many years later by [[Legolas]].{{RK|V9}} === Princes of Dol Amroth ===
